arcs.headline: A unified playground for creators and coders
arcs.summary: We've merged the documentation directly into the Play page. Now, as you tweak settings, you get live, color-coded API URLs instantlyâ€”bridging the gap between experimenting and building.

arcs.headline: New character models and smarter Gemini integration
arcs.summary: We introduced 'qwen-character' for immersive roleplay and optimized Airforce pricing for better value. Additionally, Gemini now handles code execution blocks and reasoning processes with greater reliability.

arcs.headline: A sharper, more secure Polly
arcs.summary: Polly has been updated to think more independently and resist prompt leakage, ensuring interactions feel safer, more authentic, and harder to manipulate.

one_liner: Docs meet the Playground, Polly gets smarter, and new character models arrive.
